name: Jart-cafe
desc: This e-commerce website allows customers to order artworks based on their opinions and integrates a payment gateway for secure transactions.

name: XDO Noise
desc: This research project involves developing a new adversarial attack to deceive face recognition models and identifying vulnerabilities in these systems.

name: ATM Fraud Detection System
desc: This system analyzes facial expressions, utilizes face recognition, and detects weapons to prevent ATM fraud.

name: G-POS
desc: This POS system notifies users when stock reaches a minimum level, prints bills, and includes an admin panel for management.

name: mr detective
desc: This web application allows users to search for a URL to determine whether it is safe or malicious.

name: weather app ios
desc: Search locations by name to check current weather and discover popular attractions.
